That’s a boring name. translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 完成時には数千の兵を常駐させる事が可能
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once completed, it will be possible to station thousands of soldiers permanently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、現段階は完成度３割の未完成
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, at this stage, it is only 30% complete and unfinished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんどんの人がこの事を知らない、アールコートがバレスから最近聞いていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most people don’t know about this; Arlcourt had recently heard about it from Bares.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦い、いざという事があれば使う事があるかもれない、その時は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this battle, it might be used if the situation becomes dire; at that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの機密とか関係無い使えと言われていたと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they were told to use it regardless of Lysas’ secrets or anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみも聞かされていなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami hadn’t been told either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリーム、協定違反だわ、バオラ山脈は緩衝地帯で双方が新規に砦を作るのは禁止
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Creme, this violates the agreement; the Baora Mountains are a buffer zone where building new forts by either side is forbidden.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをこんな所、これが完成しここら数千がヘルマンに奇襲攻撃をするつもりだったのね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And here it is—once completed, several thousand were planning a surprise attack on Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんどの人は知らないし、もし魔軍にばれてもここはそう簡単には攻められない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most people don’t know, and even if the demon army finds out, this place can’t be easily attacked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この絶壁は登れないし、唯一の道は一列ずつでしか歩いてこれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This sheer cliff is unclimbable, and the only path can be traversed only single file.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 物資はそれほど十分な訳では無いが、今の人数だと数ヶ月は大丈夫。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supplies aren’t abundant, but with the current numbers, they can last for several months.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな説明の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was the explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを拠点に反撃を行う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll launch a counterattack from this base.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫、シィル、サテラ、かなみが会話の中心
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaori, Shiru, Satera, and Kanami are at the center of the conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マンガン砦か・・面白くない名前だ、よし　ランス砦と命名しよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mangan Fort, huh... That’s a boring name. Alright, let’s name it Rance Fort.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部も砦内に場所を設けて作った。参謀チーム動くようになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Supreme Commander’s headquarters were also set up inside the fort. The staff team began to operate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千姫が子供達も無事に連れてきて、ここに保育所を作る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Senhime safely brought the children and set up a nursery here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新拠点
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: New base

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさん行方不明と知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Learn that Biscetta has gone missing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 救出作戦開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rescue operation begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に支配されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s controlled by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタとロナ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta and Rona.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス侵入の報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report of Rance’s infiltration.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタとロナ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta and Rona.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロナは自分を殺してと言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rona asks to be killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイと遭遇
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encounter with Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイに勝てない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cannot defeat Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタがロナを殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta kills Rona.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイは宝石に戻り潰される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red Eye returns to a gem form and is crushed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタが先程は演技であると言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta says that earlier was just an act.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロナは無事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rona is unharmed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰り道
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城を自爆させる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They self-destruct Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拠点に戻ってから、とある日
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After returning to the base, on a certain day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※ＪＡＰＡＮと砦、両方の場合があるので注意
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Note: Sometimes referring to JAPAN, sometimes to the fort—be aware.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドメイクをしているビスケッタを襲うランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance attacks Biscetta while she is making the bed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでレッドアイの時の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, explanation about the time with Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 回想シーン　レッドアイの台詞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flashback scene: Red Eye’s dialogue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケスチナの子孫を耐えたらレッドアイは死んだのかもしれません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the descendants of Kesutina had died out, Red Eye might have died as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが、彼の言う通りだとするとケスチナの子孫はその後も増えているはず、この娘が一人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, if what he says is true, the descendants of Kesutina should have continued to increase; here is one girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死のうが関係ないはず、だがレッドアイは強くそう信じていた、だからこの娘を手元に置いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her death shouldn’t matter, but Red Eye strongly believed otherwise, so he kept this girl close.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この娘が死ぬときっとショックを受けるはずと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He thought that if this girl died, he would surely be shocked...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、だから・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, that’s why...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、そうです。殺す演技をしました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, that’s right. I pretended to kill her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイドとして旦那様が望まれない事はしません、可愛い女の子を手にかけるような事はありませんよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a maid, I would never do something my master doesn’t wish; I would never harm such a cute girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまで俺の事を理解し尽くしてくれるビスケッタさんは、可愛い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta-san, who understands me this well, is adorable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旦那様、やめて下さい・・お仕事中です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Master, please stop... I’m working.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱりビスケッタさんは必要、俺のメイド長。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After all, Biscetta-san is necessary—my head maid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからもよろしく頼むぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll be counting on you from now on, too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旦那様のお世話はシィルさんがなさるべきかと、私なんかが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think Shiru-san should be the one to take care of Master, not someone like me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう謙虚な所が良い、御褒美だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That kind of humility is good; here’s a reward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロシーンイメージ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Erotic scene imagery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイド服のビスケッタ、ベッドメイク仕事中、そこにバックから襲いかかるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta in maid outfit making the bed, when Rance attacks her from behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困った感じのビスケッタだが、あいかわらず対応下手。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta looks troubled but still handles it awkwardly as always.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 完成時には数千の兵を常駐させる事が可能
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Once completed, it will be possible to station thousands of soldiers permanently.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただ、現段階は完成度３割の未完成
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, at this stage, it is only 30% complete and unfinished.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほんどんの人がこの事を知らない、アールコートがバレスから最近聞いていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most people don’t know about this; Arlcourt had recently heard about it from Bares.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この戦い、いざという事があれば使う事があるかもれない、その時は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In this battle, it might be used if the situation becomes dire; at that time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザスの機密とか関係無い使えと言われていたと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: they were told to use it regardless of Lysas’ secrets or anything.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなみも聞かされていなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kanami hadn’t been told either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クリーム、協定違反だわ、バオラ山脈は緩衝地帯で双方が新規に砦を作るのは禁止
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Creme, this violates the agreement; the Baora Mountains are a buffer zone where building new forts by either side is forbidden.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それをこんな所、これが完成しここら数千がヘルマンに奇襲攻撃をするつもりだったのね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And here it is—once completed, several thousand were planning a surprise attack on Helman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんどの人は知らないし、もし魔軍にばれてもここはそう簡単には攻められない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most people don’t know, and even if the demon army finds out, this place can’t be easily attacked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この絶壁は登れないし、唯一の道は一列ずつでしか歩いてこれない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This sheer cliff is unclimbable, and the only path can be traversed only single file.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 物資はそれほど十分な訳では無いが、今の人数だと数ヶ月は大丈夫。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supplies aren’t abundant, but with the current numbers, they can last for several months.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな説明の話
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was the explanation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここを拠点に反撃を行う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll launch a counterattack from this base.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 香姫、シィル、サテラ、かなみが会話の中心
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kaori, Shiru, Satera, and Kanami are at the center of the conversation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マンガン砦か・・面白くない名前だ、よし　ランス砦と命名しよう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mangan Fort, huh... That’s a boring name. Alright, let’s name it Rance Fort.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部も砦内に場所を設けて作った。参謀チーム動くようになる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Supreme Commander’s headquarters were also set up inside the fort. The staff team began to operate.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 千姫が子供達も無事に連れてきて、ここに保育所を作る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Senhime safely brought the children and set up a nursery here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 新拠点
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: New base

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタさん行方不明と知る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Learn that Biscetta has gone missing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 救出作戦開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rescue operation begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城に到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrive at Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍に支配されている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s controlled by the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタとロナ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta and Rona.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス侵入の報告
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Report of Rance’s infiltration.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタとロナ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta and Rona.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロナは自分を殺してと言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rona asks to be killed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイと遭遇
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Encounter with Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイに勝てない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cannot defeat Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタがロナを殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta kills Rona.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイは宝石に戻り潰される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Red Eye returns to a gem form and is crushed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ビスケッタが先程は演技であると言う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta says that earlier was just an act.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロナは無事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rona is unharmed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰り道
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the way back.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城を自爆させる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They self-destruct Rance Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レッドアイを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 拠点に戻ってから、とある日
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After returning to the base, on a certain day.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ※ＪＡＰＡＮと砦、両方の場合があるので注意
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: *Note: Sometimes referring to JAPAN, sometimes to the fort—be aware.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ベッドメイクをしているビスケッタを襲うランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance attacks Biscetta while she is making the bed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでレッドアイの時の説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, explanation about the time with Red Eye.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 回想シーン　レッドアイの台詞
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Flashback scene: Red Eye’s dialogue.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケスチナの子孫を耐えたらレッドアイは死んだのかもしれません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the descendants of Kesutina had died out, Red Eye might have died as well.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ですが、彼の言う通りだとするとケスチナの子孫はその後も増えているはず、この娘が一人
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, if what he says is true, the descendants of Kesutina should have continued to increase; here is one girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死のうが関係ないはず、だがレッドアイは強くそう信じていた、だからこの娘を手元に置いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Her death shouldn’t matter, but Red Eye strongly believed otherwise, so he kept this girl close.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この娘が死ぬときっとショックを受けるはずと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He thought that if this girl died, he would surely be shocked...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、だから・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, that’s why...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: はい、そうです。殺す演技をしました。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yes, that’s right. I pretended to kill her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイドとして旦那様が望まれない事はしません、可愛い女の子を手にかけるような事はありませんよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As a maid, I would never do something my master doesn’t wish; I would never harm such a cute girl.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここまで俺の事を理解し尽くしてくれるビスケッタさんは、可愛い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta-san, who understands me this well, is adorable.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旦那様、やめて下さい・・お仕事中です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Master, please stop... I’m working.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっぱりビスケッタさんは必要、俺のメイド長。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After all, Biscetta-san is necessary—my head maid.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これからもよろしく頼むぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’ll be counting on you from now on, too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 旦那様のお世話はシィルさんがなさるべきかと、私なんかが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I think Shiru-san should be the one to take care of Master, not someone like me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そういう謙虚な所が良い、御褒美だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That kind of humility is good; here’s a reward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エロシーンイメージ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Erotic scene imagery.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイド服のビスケッタ、ベッドメイク仕事中、そこにバックから襲いかかるランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta in maid outfit making the bed, when Rance attacks her from behind.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 困った感じのビスケッタだが、あいかわらず対応下手。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Biscetta looks troubled but still handles it awkwardly as always.
